text.*:
A New Morning

Chapter Info

Volume:

104

Chapter:

1052

Japanese Title:

新しい朝

Romanized Title:

Atarashii Asa

Viz Title:

A New Morning

Pages:

17

Release Date:

June 13, 2022

WSJ Issue:

2022 Issue 28

Anime:

Episode 1079 (p. 2-17)
Chapter Chronology
← Previous Next →

Chapter 1052 is titled "A New Morning".

Contents

  • 1 Cover Page
  • 2 Short Summary
  • 3 Long Summary
  • 4 Quick References
    • 4.1 Chapter Notes
    • 4.2 Characters
  • 5 Author Comment
  • 6 References
  • 7 Arc Navigation

Cover Page[]

Germa 66's Ahh... An Emotionless Excursion, Vol. 14: "The scientist who failed to escape"

The Germa siblings' escape is being observed by Caesar Clown.

Short Summary[]

The Five Elders learn of Joy Boy's return and that Wano has not opened up its borders. A week later, peace has begun to reign in Wano again, as plans to set up a proper burial for Oden, Ashura Doji, and Izou are underway. Luffy and Zoro recover and despite being confused by Momonosuke's new adult form, the Straw Hat Pirates and Kouzuki Family take the time to relax before the upcoming Festival that Momonosuke has planned. Meanwhile, as Apoo passes Kid and Law the newspaper with the new bounties, Admiral Ryokugyu is observing the situation from the air.

Long Summary[]

The Five Elders discuss two recent major developments in Wano Country after being informed by the remaining CP0 agent: the emergence of Nika and the subsequent defeat of Big Mom and Kaidou during the Raid on Onigashima. Saturn commented that the reveal of such information would be impossible to censor and are asking the other Elders what to do. Meanwhile, the CP0 agent Joseph, who had returned to the World Government fleet stationed outside Wano, reported that Zunesha has left the area. Nusjuro responds that the country will keep its borders closed and that an invasion will be thwarted, yet still asks Joseph to capture Nico Robin. However, Joseph is unable to hear the latter when their signal is being jammed, by a mysterious voice who states for them to stay in position as they will be there soon.

At the Onigashima castle, X Drake encounters Basil Hawkins who is barely able to stand. Hawkins learns that Drake is still a member of the Marines but the latter refuses to confirm. Hawkins then sits leaning at a pillar and reveals to Drake that he worked for Kaidou because he would not stand a chance if he refused. However, he also acknowledges how Eustass Kid and Killer continued resisting despite certain death. He then reveals to Drake that the "certain man" who has a one percent of surviving the raid was himself. He then faints.

Seven days have passed since the end of the raid and the Fire Festival. At a school in the Flower Capital, a new teacher has replaced Sarahebi and revises the entire history course with a lesson on the life of Kouzuki Oden. The citizens also learn that Komurasaki was Kouzuki Hiyori and that Kawamatsu saved her from the burning castle. They also enjoy clean drinking water and an abundance of food. They also discuss that the man who defeated Kaidou was someone named Joy Boy. They believe that he has already left the country, and compare him to the legendary "Sword God" Ryuma.

Meanwhile, at the graveyard in Ringo, Kawamatsu and Kin'emon discuss the building of a temple dedicated to Kouzuki Oden, including his fellow Daimyo and ending with a tribute to Ashura Doji and Izou. Onimaru returns to Kawamatsu and Marco has also arrived at the temple. They also take into account those who are injured and prayed for their recovery.

Yamato is seen sitting at the top of the former Orochi Castle. He is then overjoyed after hearing from Hiyori that both Luffy and Zoro are awake and have fully recovered while kicking Momonosuke in the face. Luffy and Zoro also fails to acknowledge the grown Momonosuke and attempts to grab Nami to comfort him, only to be sent flying. Sanji and Brook then mock Momonosuke that they are "welcoming him into the adult world" and that he can no longer have the "privilege" of staying with Nami. Yamato also teases him by putting a plate on his head.

Nami then invites Yamato to take a bath together noting that his prayers have been answered, but the latter refuses because there are no shared baths in the castle. Sanji also learns that Hiyori cleaned Zoro while he was recovering which turned into a brawl between the two. Amidst the commotion, Kikunojo then joins the women in Yamato's stead. Yamato then joins the men as they bathed in the Castle onsen, which caused Sanji to have another nosebleed. Nami then joins the female retainers in the female end of the onsen.

After the bath, the citizens decide to celebrate the return of the Kouzuki Family as the Shogun of Wano. Meanwhile, Franky and Usopp are joined by Minatomo in fixing the ships as well as the General Franky at the Tokage Port in Udon. Bepo and Killer are amazed by Franky's robot but Kid and Law and the rest of their crews not to become too attached with the other groups. Scratchmen Apoo then arrives being carried by Inbi. He brought a copy of the day's Newspaper, the headline being the so-called "New Emperors of the Sea" and their new bounties.

Meanwhile, Ryokugyu is flying in the air near the Wano mainland. He is talking with Sakazuki and was told not to cause any more commotions.

Quick References[]

Chapter Notes[]

  • Joseph has returned to the World Government fleet outside Wano Country.
    • He has reported the events to the Five Elders.
    • Someone intercepts CP0's call and orders the fleet to remain in position as they plan to arrive soon.
      • This jamming prevents the CP0 agent from receiving the orders of capturing Robin.
  • Zunesha has left Wano.
    • The Five Elders realize this is a sign that Wano's borders are still closed.
  • Drake and Hawkins, both heavily injured, discuss Hawkins' predictions and betrayal.
    • Hawkins reveals he foresaw Kaidou's defeat, but was too prideful to turn back to Kid after betraying him the first time.
    • The man Hawkins foresaw as having 1% chance of surviving throughout the raid was himself.
    • At the end, Hawkins collapses.
  • A week has passed since the battle on Onigashima.
  • Sarahebi is revealed to no longer be a teacher and instead replaced by a new teacher, who plans to teach the students the true entire history of Wano.
    • The new teacher's design is based on Shōwa era actor Torazō Hirosawa.[1]
  • Momonosuke plans to throw another festival.
    • The true history of the Kouzuki Clan for the past 20 years has become public knowledge among Wano's citizens.
    • Before passing out Luffy asked Momonosuke not to give his name to Wano's citizens so instead they came to know him as Joy Boy and his role in the fight against Kaidou.
  • Izou and Ashura Doji are confirmed to have died in the raid.
    • Their weapons have been moved to Ringo, where the Scabbards plan to hold a burial for them, Kouzuki Oden and the former Daimyo that had fought for Wano, starting with Shimotsuki Yasuie.
  • Kawamatsu reunites with Onimaru.
  • Luffy and Zoro finally awaken from being knocked unconscious.
  • The Straw Hats (minus Robin, Franky and Usopp), Kouzuki Family, Nekomamushi, Yamato, Tama, Speed, Shinobu, Carrot and Toko take a bath together at the Castle Onsen.
  • Franky, Usopp, and Minatomo repair the Thousand Sunny, the Victoria Punk, and the Polar Tang in one of the harbors.
    • The Kid Pirates and Heart Pirates are also present.
    • General Franky is also fully repaired.
  • Apoo and Inbi arrive with a newspaper reporting on the new bounties.
    • Apoo was the one who leaked the events of the raid to the outside world.
    • Apoo claims that there are new members in the Four Emperors.
  • Ryokugyu is nearing Wano from the sky.
    • He is shown to have a large flower on his back that he uses to fly.
    • He is speaking with Sakazuki via Den Den Mushi.

Author Comment[]


Author Comment
  • Translation
  • Original


Rice paper is so fun. Wrap a salad from the convenience store and suddenly you have a spring roll! I can wrap anything!


ライスペーパー楽しい！コンビニのサラダを包んで生春巻き！なんでも巻くぜ！

—Eiichiro Oda
English translation by VIZ Media. For comprehensive translation credits, see here.

References[]

  1. ↑ SBS One Piece Manga — Vol. 105 (p. 148).

Hawkins then sits leaning at a pillar and reveals to Drake that he worked for Kaidou because he would not stand a chance if he refused. Luffy|Luffy]] and [[Roronoa Zoro|Zoro]] are awake and have fully recovered while kicking [[Kouzuki Momonosuke|Momonosuke]] in the face. ===Chapter Notes===
*[[Joseph]] has returned to the [[World Government]] fleet outside [[Wano Country]].
**He has reported the [[Raid on Onigashima|events]] to the [[Five Elders]].
**Someone intercepts CP0's call and orders the fleet to remain in position as they plan to arrive soon.
***This jamming prevents the CP0 agent from receiving the orders of capturing [[Nico Robin|Robin]].

**The Five Elders realize this is a sign that Wano's borders are still closed.
*[[X Drake|Drake]] and [[Basil Hawkins|Hawkins]], both heavily injured, discuss Hawkins' predictions and betrayal.
**Hawkins reveals he foresaw [[Kaidou]]'s defeat, but was too prideful to turn back to [[Eustass Kid|Kid]] after betraying him the first time.
**The man Hawkins [[Chapter 990|foresaw]] as having 1% chance of surviving throughout the raid was himself.
**At the end, Hawkins collapses.
*A week has passed since the [[Raid on Onigashima|battle on Onigashima]].
*[[Sarahebi]] is revealed to no longer be a teacher and instead replaced by a new teacher, who plans to teach the students the true entire history of Wano.
**The new teacher's design is based on {{W|Shōwa era}} actor [https://www.themoviedb.org/person/1625491-torazo-hirosawa Torazō Hirosawa].{{Qref|sbs=105|page=148}}
*[[Kouzuki Momonosuke|Momonosuke]] plans to throw another festival.
**The true history of the [[Kouzuki Clan]] for the past 20 years has become public knowledge among Wano's citizens.
**Before passing out [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] asked Momonosuke not to give his name to Wano's citizens so instead they came to know him as [[Joy Boy]] and his role in the fight against Kaidou.
*[[Izou]] and [[Ashura Doji]] are confirmed to have died in the raid.
**Their weapons have been moved to [[Ringo]], where the [[Nine Red Scabbards|Scabbards]] plan to hold a burial for them, [[Kouzuki Oden]] and the former [[Daimyo]] that had fought for Wano, starting with [[Shimotsuki Yasuie]].
*[[Kawamatsu]] reunites with [[Onimaru]].
*Luffy and [[Roronoa Zoro|Zoro]] finally awaken from being knocked unconscious.
*The [[Straw Hat Pirates|Straw Hats]] (minus Robin, [[Franky]] and [[Usopp]]), [[Kouzuki Family]], [[Nekomamushi]], [[Yamato]], [[Kurozumi Tama|Tama]], [[Speed]], [[Shinobu]], [[Carrot]] and [[Toko]] take a bath together at the Castle Onsen.
*Franky, Usopp, and [[Minatomo (Wano)|Minatomo]] repair the [[Thousand Sunny]], the [[Victoria Punk]], and the [[Polar Tang]] in one of the harbors.
**The [[Kid Pirates]] and [[Heart Pirates]] are also present.
**[[Battle Frankies/General Franky|General Franky]] is also fully repaired.
*[[Scratchmen Apoo|Apoo]] and [[Inbi]] arrive with a [[newspaper]] reporting on the new bounties.
**Apoo was the one who leaked the events of the raid to the outside world.
**Apoo claims that there are new members in the [[Four Emperors]].
*[[Aramaki|Ryokugyu]] is nearing Wano from the sky.
**He is shown to have a large flower on his back that he uses to fly.
**He is speaking with [[Sakazuki]] via [[Den Den Mushi]].
